name: Freelancer Life Simulator
storyline:
Do you like independence and free working hours? Dreaming of making money sitting at home in front of your computer? - Then freelance work is what you need. Earn money by helping others bring their projects to reality.

Become one of the best freelancers, starting your way from scratch. Fulfill orders of varying difficulty. Increase your knowledge to discover more difficult and higher-paying jobs. Improve your computer, equip your apartment. Create a cozy nook where you can enjoy all the pleasures of freelance work.
summary: Become one of the best freelancers, starting your way from scratch. Fulfill orders of varying difficulty.
